feed.title: |tʃəːp| Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest |tʃəːp| news and events.

entry.title: Early Launch
entry.summary:
This is an early launch of Chirp, still much needs to be improved and added. It should still be in development but I really wanted to submit it to the Shiny Contest to see how it'd fare.

This post gives some idea of how Chirp was put together as well as the roadmap ahead.
